name: Core\Lib\Database\Blueprint
short_desc: Handles schema definitions before executing them.

table.name: table
table.short_desc: The name of the table to be modified.

after.name: after
after.short_desc:
Specifies the position of the last defined column to appear
immediately after another column in the table (MySQL only).
after.hint_desc: Returns the current Blueprint instance for method chaining.

column.name: column
column.short_desc: The existing column name after which the new column should be added.

bigInteger.name: bigInteger
bigInteger.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as BIGINT.

boolean.name: boolean
boolean.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as TINYINT(1).

date.name: date
date.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as DATE.

dateTime.name: dateTime
dateTime.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as DATETIME.

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

scale.name: scale
scale.short_desc: Number of digits after the decimal.

default.name: default
default.short_desc: Adds a DEFAULT value to the last defined column.
default.long_desc:
This method appends a default value to the most recently added column
in the schema definition. It supports string, integer, float, and boolean
values. If no columns have been added yet, it throws an exception.
In SQLite, default values for certain column types like TEXT and BLOB are skipped.
default.hint_desc: Returns the current Blueprint instance for method chaining.
exceptions: If no column has been defined yet or the column type cannot be determined.

value.name: value
value.short_desc:
The default value to assign to the last defined column.
Strings will be wrapped in quotes. Other types will be cast directly.

dropColumns.name: dropColumns
dropColumns.short_desc:
Drops a column or group of columns.  If a column has a restraint
then warnings are presented to the user.

columns.name: columns
columns.short_desc:
An individual column or an array of
columns to drop.

dropForeign.name: dropForeign
dropForeign.short_desc: Drops a foreign key constraint from the table (MySQL only).

column.name: column
column.short_desc: The name of the column to be dropped.

preserveColumn.name: preserveColumn
preserveColumn.short_desc:
When true only the foreign key constraint is
removed.  If set to false the column is also dropped from the table.
The default value is true.

dropIfExists.name: dropIfExists
dropIfExists.short_desc: Drops a table if it exists.

table.name: table
table.short_desc: The name of the table to drop if it exists.

dropIndex.name: dropIndex
dropIndex.short_desc: Drops indexed value from the table.

column.name: column
column.short_desc: The name of the column to be dropped.

preserveColumn.name: preserveColumn
preserveColumn.short_desc:
When true only the index constraint is
removed.  If set to false the column is also dropped from the table.
The default value is true.

dropPrimaryKey.name: dropPrimaryKey
dropPrimaryKey.short_desc: Drops primary key field from the table.

column.name: column
column.short_desc: The name of the column to be dropped.

preserveColumn.name: preserveColumn
preserveColumn.short_desc:
When true only the primary key constraint is
removed.  If set to false the column is also dropped from the table.
The default value is true.

dropUnique.name: dropUnique
dropUnique.short_desc: Drops column with unique constraint from the table.

column.name: column
column.short_desc: The name of the column to be dropped.

preserveColumn.name: preserveColumn
preserveColumn.short_desc:
When true only the unique constraint is
removed.  If set to false the column is also dropped from the table.
The default value is true.

double.name: double
double.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as DOUBLE.

scale.name: scale
scale.short_desc: Number of digits after the decimal.

enum.name: enum
enum.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the enum column.

values.name: values
values.short_desc: An array of allowed values for the ENUM.

float.name: float
float.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as FLOAT.

scale.name: scale
scale.short_desc: Number of digits after the decimal.

column.name: column
column.short_desc: The column name to add a foreign key constraint on.

onTable.name: onTable
onTable.short_desc: The name of the table being referenced.

column.name: column
column.short_desc: The column name to add an index on.

integer.name: integer
integer.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as INT.

mediumInteger.name: mediumInteger
mediumInteger.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as MEDIUMINT.

nullable.name: nullable
nullable.short_desc: Modifies last column added to the schema and make it nullable.
nullable.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

renameIndex.name: renameIndex
renameIndex.short_desc: Renames an indexed column by preserving and reapplying the index.

renameUnique.name: renameUnique
renameUnique.short_desc: Renames a column with a unique constraint by preserving and reapplying the index.

smallInteger.name: smallInteger
smallInteger.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as SMALLINT.

softDeletes.name: softDeletes
softDeletes.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

string.name: string
string.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

length.name: length
length.short_desc: The maximum length of the string column.

text.name: text
text.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as TEXT.

time.name: time
time.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as TIME.

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as TIMESTAMP.

tinyInteger.name: tinyInteger
tinyInteger.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as TINYINT or INTEGER depending on DB driver.

unique.name: unique
unique.short_desc: Adds a unique index to the last defined column.
exceptions: if no column has been defined yet.

unsignedInteger.name: unsignedInteger
unsignedInteger.short_desc: Define an unsigned integer column (MySQL only).
unsignedInteger.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as unsigned INT (MySQL) or INTEGER.

unsignedBigInteger.name: unsignedBigInteger
unsignedBigInteger.short_desc: Define an unsigned big integer column (MySQL only).
unsignedBigInteger.hint_desc: Return the instance to allow method chaining.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as unsigned BIGINT (MySQL) or INTEGER for SQLite.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: The name of the column to be created as UUID.
